transfer.description: Transfers tokens to the specified address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another.

approve.description: Approves the spender to spend a specified amount of tokens.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens that the spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of the specified address.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the given parameters.

Approval.description: Emitted when approval is granted to spend tokens.
